about_the_game:
Two Coins is a time-traveling action-adventure game where you play as Richard, an ordinary man living an uneventful life. After finding a magazine about forests and wilderness at work, he is inspired to embark on a journey into the woods.

As Richard walks through the forest, dusk begins to fall. Suddenly, he stumbles into a cave and loses consciousness. When he wakes up, he is disoriented and struggles to find his way home. Everything around him is unfamiliar—and it’s clear that something has changed.

This single-player game lets you switch between first-person and third-person perspectives. Survive by hunting, eating, and drinking. Complete tasks for various individuals, contribute to the village, and even build a temporary shelter. But perhaps the most important goal is to find a way back to the present—if such a thing is even possible.

content_descriptors.notes:
Two Coins features blood, hunting, weapons, and the ability to kill NPCs.

Alcohol and nudity may be introduced in the future. If added, these elements will align with the standards of similar games. Should these features become available, nudity will be optional and can be enabled or disabled by the player. In such cases, both the player and NPCs may appear nude when the feature is enabled.

detailed_description:
Two Coins is a time-traveling action-adventure game where you play as Richard, an ordinary man living an uneventful life. After finding a magazine about forests and wilderness at work, he is inspired to embark on a journey into the woods.

As Richard walks through the forest, dusk begins to fall. Suddenly, he stumbles into a cave and loses consciousness. When he wakes up, he is disoriented and struggles to find his way home. Everything around him is unfamiliar—and it’s clear that something has changed.

This single-player game lets you switch between first-person and third-person perspectives. Survive by hunting, eating, and drinking. Complete tasks for various individuals, contribute to the village, and even build a temporary shelter. But perhaps the most important goal is to find a way back to the present—if such a thing is even possible.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

name: Two Coins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super / Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: During a forest excursion, you suddenly fall into a cave and lose consciousness. When you awaken, you discover that you've been transported 500 years into the past. Will you choose to settle in this new time, or will you search for a way to return to your own?
